metaElementDuplicated.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element is duplicated
metaElementDuplicated.message: 'charset' meta element is not needed as one was already specified.

metaElementFirstThing.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element is not the first element in '<head>'
metaElementFirstThing.message: 'charset' meta element should be the first thing in '<head>'.

metaElementInBody.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element is in the '<body>'
metaElementInBody.message: 'charset' meta element should be specified in the '<head>', not '<body>'.

metaElementNotSpecified.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element was not specified

metaElementShorter.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element is used in a long form
metaElementShorter.message: 'charset' meta element should be specified using shorter '<meta charset="utf-8">' form.

metaElementWrongValue.description: Report message when the 'charset' meta element has a wrong value
